seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'AI Data Engineer' with 1+ years experience required, suggesting entry to mid-level rather than senior. No mention of senior-level responsibilities like mentoring or architecture leadership.

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with core focus on data pipelines, AI/ML model training, data transformation, and Azure-based deployments.

sub_specialty.evidence: Strong emphasis on AI/ML model deployment, Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, and AI infrastructure. Role specifically mentions 'AI Competence Center' and model deployment responsibilities.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Pure individual contributor role with no mention of direct reports, team leadership, or management responsibilities. Focus is on hands-on technical work and collaboration.

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure services, Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, and Azure DevOps are explicitly mentioned as core requirements. Multiple Azure-specific technologies listed in must-have skills.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure ecosystem. All cloud-related requirements are Azure-specific.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both batch processing (data pipelines, scheduled workflows) and real-time AI model deployment, suggesting hybrid approach to data processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps explicitly mentioned as requirement, which is Microsoft's cloud-native CI/CD and orchestration platform.

storage_layer.evidence: Microsoft Fabric mentioned as requirement, which is Microsoft's lakehouse architecture platform combining data lake and data warehouse capabilities.

remote_restriction.evidence: Located in Prague, Czechia with hybrid work model. Language requirements (Czech/Slovak fluent) suggest local candidate preference.

timezone_focus.evidence: Prague, Czechia location indicates European timezone focus. No mention of other timezone requirements or global teams.

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model mentioned with no relocation requirements stated. Role appears to be for candidates already in Prague area.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting. Located in Czechia which would require different visa types than H1B.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support. Requirements suggest work authorization needed but no specific student-friendly language.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned. Language requirements suggest EU work authorization would be sufficient.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits package suggests traditional employee (W2) rather than contractor arrangement.

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits list including 5 weeks vacation, training, certifications, workshops, pension contributions, insurance, and modern office facilities.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'Focus on your development' and training opportunities but no specific career tracks or advancement paths mentioned.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with 'senior AI developer' and 'continuous learning' which implies mentorship opportunities but no formal program stated.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit promotion or advancement paths mentioned in the job description.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company.

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role appears focused on individual contributor path with technical specialization in AI/ML infrastructure. No management track mentioned.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have vs nice-to-have distinction with specific technical requirements but reasonable experience expectations (1+ years).

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined AI Data Engineer role with specific responsibilities, clear technical stack, and focused scope on AI/ML infrastructure.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Reasonable skill requirements for the experience level (1+ years). Skills align well with AI data engineering focus and Azure ecosystem.
